title: Open the Store for the Day
description: A store manager needs to perform the morning opening procedures.

tasks.description: Log into the store management system and start the 'Opening Checklist' task.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager accesses the daily opening procedure checklist.

tasks.description: Count the cash in the safe and prepare the cash floats for each POS terminal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager confirms the safe balance and correctly prepares the cash drawers.

tasks.description: Complete all checklist items (e.g., 'Check lighting', 'Turn on music') and formally open the store for business in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: All opening tasks are completed, and the POS systems are ready to accept transactions.
